name: apis/nftport/v0/All chain NFT transactions retriever
description:
Returns all on-chain transactions for the whole chain, using the NFTPort API. Can be set to include transactions such as transfer, mint, burn, sale or all which includes all transactions.
Supports Ethereum only.

https://docs.nftport.xyz/docs/nftport/b3A6NjExMTE4MzQ-retrieve-all-transactions

df450167-1afc-4494-b1c3-afa5c07b3f69.type:
{
  "api_key": string,
  optional "chain": "ethereum",
  optional "continuation": string,
  optional "page_size": number,
  optional "type": ("transfer" or "mint" or "burn" or "sale" or "all")[],
  optional "from_block": number,
  optional "to_block": number
}
df450167-1afc-4494-b1c3-afa5c07b3f69.name: params

c74ef5b6-1c9b-49f2-9444-e64dd26fc0eb.name: data
